description:
According to Star magazine, the former Gossip Girl actress is engaged to The OC’s Adam Brody!据《Star》杂志报道，《绯闻女孩》女星Leighton Meester和《橘子镇男孩》男演员Adam Brody订婚了。

“Leighton and Adam are crazy about each other” a source revealed to the mag. “[They’ve] talked about getting married eventually, but she had no idea he would propose so soon! It was the surprise of her life and she’s ecstatic!”“Leighton和Adam之间的感情非常好”一位知情人士透露。“他们已经到了谈婚论嫁的阶段，不过她没想到他会这么快求婚！被求婚的时候，Leighton非常惊讶和开心。”

“Right now their plan is to get married next summer,” the source explains. “They are still deciding if they want a destination wedding or if they’ll marry in Southern California.”“他们打算明年夏天结婚，”消息人士说。“他们还在犹豫，是旅行结婚还是在加利福尼亚州南部举行婚礼。”
